title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Interdisciplinary Education Design Workshop Based on the FEW-Nexus

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of general science and pedagogy, foundational STEM knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the FEW-Nexus concept by connecting it to three or more real-world cases.
Learners submit an instructional design plan utilizing interdisciplinary collaboration strategies.
Learners improve self-efficacy in FEW-Nexus-related educational content by 20% compared to pre-assessment.
Learners plan community-based learning projects and propose strategies for linking with local communities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
